Bruschetta al Pomodoro.name: Bruschetta al Pomodoro
Bruschetta al Pomodoro.description: Classic Italian appetizer with fresh tomatoes, basil, and garlic on toasted bread
Bruschetta al Pomodoro.instructions:
1. Dice tomatoes and place in bowl
2. Mince garlic and chop basil
3. Combine tomatoes, garlic, basil, olive oil, salt, and pepper
4. Let marinate for 15 minutes
5. Serve on toasted bread slices

nightshades.reason: Contains Roma tomatoes, which are nightshade vegetables

Asian Lettuce Wraps.name: Asian Lettuce Wraps
Asian Lettuce Wraps.description: Light and flavorful chicken lettuce wraps with ginger, garlic, and soy
Asian Lettuce Wraps.instructions:
1. Dice chicken into small pieces
2. Mince ginger and garlic
3. Heat sesame oil and sautÃ© chicken until cooked
4. Add ginger, garlic, onion, and soy sauce
5. Separate lettuce leaves for cups
6. Fill lettuce cups with chicken mixture
7. Top with fresh cilantro

Loaded Potato Skins.name: Loaded Potato Skins
Loaded Potato Skins.description: Crispy potato skins loaded with bacon, cheese, and sour cream
Loaded Potato Skins.instructions:
1. Bake potatoes until tender
2. Cut in half and scoop out most of the flesh
3. Brush skins with oil and bake until crispy
4. Cook bacon until crispy and chop
5. Fill potato skins with cheese and bacon
6. Bake until cheese melts
7. Top with sour cream and serve

Shrimp Cocktail.name: Shrimp Cocktail
Shrimp Cocktail.description: Chilled jumbo shrimp with classic cocktail sauce
Shrimp Cocktail.instructions:
1. Boil water with salt and lemon
2. Add shrimp and cook for 3-4 minutes until pink
3. Shock in ice bath immediately
4. Arrange on plate with lemon wedges
5. Serve chilled with cocktail sauce

shellfish.reason: Contains shrimp, which is a crustacean shellfish

Caprese Salad.name: Caprese Salad
Caprese Salad.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil drizzled with balsamic
Caprese Salad.instructions:
1. Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into rounds
2. Arrange alternating slices on plate
3. Tuck basil leaves between slices
4. Drizzle with olive oil
5. Season with salt and pepper

Grilled Salmon.name: Grilled Salmon
Grilled Salmon.description: Fresh Atlantic salmon grilled to perfection with lemon butter
Grilled Salmon.instructions:
1. Season salmon with salt and pepper
2. Preheat grill to medium-high
3. Grill salmon skin-side down for 6-8 minutes
4. Flip and cook for 4-5 minutes more
5. Make lemon butter sauce with garlic and parsley
6. Drizzle sauce over salmon and serve

Spaghetti Carbonara.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
Spaghetti Carbonara.description: Classic Roman pasta with eggs, bacon, and Parmesan
Spaghetti Carbonara.instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente
2. Dice and cook bacon until crispy
3. Whisk eggs with Parmesan and black pepper
4. Reserve pasta water and drain pasta
5. Toss hot pasta with bacon and fat
6. Remove from heat and quickly mix in egg mixture
7. Add pasta water to reach desired consistency
8. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan

Chicken Stir Fry.name: Chicken Stir Fry
Chicken Stir Fry.description: Savory Asian-style chicken and vegetables over jasmine rice
Chicken Stir Fry.instructions:
1. Cook rice according to package directions
2. Dice chicken and season with salt
3. Slice peppers and onions
4. Mince ginger and garlic
5. Heat wok or large pan with vegetable oil
6. Stir-fry chicken until cooked through
7. Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp
8. Add soy sauce and sesame oil
9. Serve over jasmine rice

Classic Burger.name: Classic Burger
Classic Burger.description: Hand-formed beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and house sauce
Classic Burger.instructions:
1. Form ground beef into 4 equal patties
2. Season generously with salt and pepper
3. Heat griddle or pan over high heat
4. Cook burgers 4-5 minutes per side for medium
5. Toast buns if using
6. Assemble burgers with lettuce, tomato, and onion
7. Serve immediately

metadata.description: Contains sesame seeds or sesame products
Contains tree nuts (almonds, walnuts, cashews, etc.)

corn.ai_reason: Vegetable oil blend may contain corn oil

soy.reason: Vegetable oil blend commonly contains soybean oil

Fettuccine Alfredo.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
Fettuccine Alfredo.description: Creamy Parmesan sauce tossed with fresh fettuccine
Fettuccine Alfredo.instructions:
1. Cook fettuccine in salted boiling water until al dente
2. Meanwhile, melt butter in large pan
3. Add minced garlic and sautÃ© briefly
4. Add heavy cream and bring to simmer
5. Whisk in Parmesan cheese until smooth
6. Season with salt and pepper
7. Toss drained pasta with sauce
8. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan

Pork Tenderloin.name: Pork Tenderloin
Pork Tenderloin.description: Herb-roasted pork tenderloin with garlic and rosemary
Pork Tenderloin.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 400Â°F
2. Season pork with salt and pepper
3. Rub with minced garlic and olive oil
4. Sear on all sides in hot pan
5. Transfer to oven and roast 15-20 minutes
6. Internal temperature should reach 145Â°F
7. Let rest 5 minutes before slicing

Mushroom Risotto.name: Mushroom Risotto
Mushroom Risotto.description: Creamy Italian rice with sautÃ©ed mushrooms and Parmesan
Mushroom Risotto.instructions:
1. SautÃ© mushrooms in olive oil until golden, set aside
2. In same pan, cook onions and garlic until soft
3. Add rice and toast for 1 minute
4. Gradually add hot stock, stirring constantly
5. Cook until rice is creamy and al dente (about 20 minutes)
6. Stir in mushrooms, butter, and Parmesan
7. Season with salt and pepper
8. Let rest 2 minutes before serving

Sausage Pasta.name: Sausage Pasta
Sausage Pasta.description: Italian sausage with penne in a light tomato sauce
Sausage Pasta.instructions:
1. Cook pasta in salted boiling water until al dente
2. Remove sausage from casings and brown in pan
3. Add onions and garlic, cook until soft
4. Crush tomatoes and add to pan
5. Simmer sauce for 15 minutes
6. Toss pasta with sauce
7. Top with fresh basil and Parmesan

Chocolate Lava Cake.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
Chocolate Lava Cake.description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten center
Chocolate Lava Cake.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 425Â°F
2. Butter and flour 4 ramekins
3. Melt chocolate and butter together
4. Whisk eggs with sugar until thick
5. Fold in chocolate mixture and vanilla
6. Gently fold in flour
7. Divide batter among ramekins
8. Bake 12-14 minutes until edges are firm
9. Let cool 1 minute, then invert onto plates
10. Serve immediately with ice cream

Tiramisu.name: Tiramisu
Tiramisu.description: Classic Italian dessert with espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone
Tiramisu.instructions:
1. Brew strong espresso and let cool
2. Separate eggs and beat yolks with sugar
3. Fold in mascarpone cheese
4. Whip cream to soft peaks and fold in
5. Dip ladyfingers in espresso briefly
6. Layer ladyfingers in dish
7. Spread half the cream mixture
8. Repeat layers
9. Dust with cocoa powder
10. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight

Cheesecake.name: Cheesecake
Cheesecake.description: New York style cheesecake with graham cracker crust
Cheesecake.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 325Â°F
2. Make crust with graham crackers and butter
3. Press into springform pan
4. Beat cream cheese until smooth
5. Add sugar, eggs, sour cream, flour, and vanilla
6. Pour into crust
7. Bake in water bath for 60-70 minutes
8. Turn off oven and let cool inside for 1 hour
9. Refrigerate overnight before serving

Panna Cotta.name: Panna Cotta
Panna Cotta.description: Silky Italian cream dessert with berry compote
Panna Cotta.instructions:
1. Bloom gelatin in cold water
2. Heat cream, milk, and sugar until just simmering
3. Remove from heat and whisk in gelatin
4. Add vanilla extract
5. Pour into ramekins or molds
6. Refrigerate 4 hours or until set
7. Serve with fresh berries or compote

Espresso.name: Espresso
Espresso.instructions:
1. Grind fresh coffee beans to espresso fineness
2. Tamp grounds in portafilter
3. Extract for 25-30 seconds
4. Serve immediately

Cappuccino.name: Cappuccino
Cappuccino.description: Classic Italian coffee with steamed milk and foam
Cappuccino.instructions:
1. Pull double shot of espresso
2. Steam milk to 150-155Â°F
3. Pour steamed milk into espresso
4. Top with foam
5. Optional: dust with cocoa powder

Iced Coffee.name: Iced Coffee
Iced Coffee.description: Cold-brewed coffee over ice with cream
Iced Coffee.instructions:
1. Brew coffee double strength
2. Let cool to room temperature
3. Fill glass with ice
4. Pour coffee over ice
5. Add cream and sugar to taste
6. Stir and serve

Soy-Ginger Fried Chicken.name: Soy-Ginger Fried Chicken
Soy-Ginger Fried Chicken.description: Crispy fried chicken marinated in soy-ginger sauce, served with fresh lemon wedges and scallions
Soy-Ginger Fried Chicken.instructions: 1. Combine soy sauce, minced ginger, minced garlic, rice vinegar, and brown sugar to make marinade. 2. Cut chicken thighs into 5 oz portions and marinate for 30 minutes. 3. Mix flour, cornstarch, baking powder, salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder in large bowl. 4. Remove chicken from marinade and dip in buttermilk, then coat thoroughly in seasoned flour mixture. 5. Heat oil to 350°F in deep fryer or heavy pot. 6. Fry chicken pieces in batches for 12-15 minutes until golden brown and internal temperature reaches 165°F. 7. Drain on wire rack for 2 minutes. 8. Cut lemons into wedges and slice scallions thinly. 9. Serve immediately with lemon wedges and garnish with sliced scallions.

Spicy Tomato Soup.name: Spicy Tomato Soup
Spicy Tomato Soup.description: Rich and creamy tomato soup with a bold spicy kick, perfect for warming up any meal
Spicy Tomato Soup.instructions: 1. Heat olive oil in large pot over medium heat. 2. Dice onion and mince garlic, then sauté until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes. 3. Add tomato paste and cook for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. 4. Add crushed tomatoes, vegetable stock, cayenne pepper, paprika, red pepper flakes, salt, black pepper, and sugar. 5. Bring mixture to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes. 6. Using immersion blender, blend soup until smooth consistency is achieved. 7. Stir in heavy cream and chopped fresh basil. 8. Simmer for additional 5 minutes. 9. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed. 10. Serve hot in 8 oz portions.
